law.catch_line: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: As to a recipient of services under the Maryland Developmental Disabilities Law, a word used in this title has the same meaning as is indicated by a definition of the word in § 7-101 of this article.
As to a recipient of services under the Maryland Mental Hygiene Law, a word used in this title has the same meaning as is indicated by a definition of the word in § 10-101 of this article.

text.section:
"Chargeable person" means:
Any responsible relative;
Except for a recipient of services, any other person who is legally responsible for the care of the individual; and
Any person who maintains a policy of health insurance under which a recipient of services is insured.

section.section: "Cost of care" means the cost of care, maintenance, treatment, and support of a recipient of services.

"Cost of care" includes the cost of:
An evaluation of an individual required under the Maryland Developmental Disabilities Law; and
Any juvenile screening or treatment service provided to an individual under § 9-227(b)(1)(ii) of the Human Services Article.
"Recipient of services" means an individual who receives care, maintenance, treatment, or support in a facility or program that is operated or funded wholly or partly by the Department.

text.section:
"Responsible relative" means:
The spouse of a recipient of services;
The parents of a recipient of services who is a minor; and
The children of a recipient of services.
